mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, I_ID AS idspm, I_IDSPP AS id, C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahun, I_SPMNO AS noSpm, I_SPPNO AS noSpp, D_SPMNO AS tglSpm, C_JENIS AS kodeJenis, C_BEBAN AS kodeBeban, I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", N_PPTK AS namaPptk, I_PPTK_NIP AS nipPptk, C_BULAN AS bulan, KET AS keterangan, N_SKPD AS "skpd.namaSkpd", V_SPP AS nilaiSpp FROM ( SELECT TMSPM.I_ID, TMSPP.I_ID AS I_IDSPP, TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, TMSPM.I_SPMNO, TMSPM.D_SPMNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, TMSPM.E_SPM AS KET, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, SUM (TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.V_SPP) V_SPP FROM TMSPP , TMSPM, TMSPPCETAK, TMSPPRINCIBIAYA , TRSKPD WHERE TMSPM.I_IDSPP = TMSPP.I_ID AND TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_IDSPP = TMSPP.I_ID AND TMSPPCETAK.C_STATUS_CETAK ='1' AND TMSPP.I_ID = TMSPPCETAK.I_ID AND TRSKPD.I_ID = TMSPP.I_IDSKPD AND TMSPP.C_BEBAN = 'LS' AND TMSPP.C_JENIS = '4' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TMSPMCETAK WHERE TMSPMCETAK.I_ID = TMSPM.I_ID ) AND TMSPM.I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} AND TMSPM.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} GROUP BY TMSPM.I_ID, TMSPP.I_ID , TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, TMSPM.I_SPMNO, TMSPM.D_SPMNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, TMSPM.E_SPM, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD union all SELECT NULL AS I_ID, TMSPP.I_ID AS I_IDSPP, TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, NULL AS I_SPMNO, NULL AS D_SPMNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, NULL AS KET, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, SUM (TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.V_SPP) V_SPP FROM TMSPP ,TMSPPCETAK, TMSPPRINCIBIAYA , TRSKPD WHERE TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_IDSPP = TMSPP.I_ID AND TMSPPCETAK.C_STATUS_CETAK ='1' AND TMSPP.I_ID = TMSPPCETAK.I_ID AND TRSKPD.I_ID = TMSPP.I_IDSKPD AND TMSPP.C_BEBAN = 'LS' AND TMSPP.C_JENIS = '4' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TMSPM WHERE TMSPP.I_ID = TMSPM.I_IDSPP ) AND TMSPP.I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} AND TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} GROUP BY TMSPP.I_ID , TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND ROWNUM > #{offset} ORDER BY I_SPMNO

SELECT COUNT (*) AS banyak FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, I_ID AS idspm, I_IDSPP AS id, C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahun, I_SPMNO AS noSpm, I_SPPNO AS noSpp, D_SPMNO AS tglSpm, C_JENIS AS kodeJenis, C_BEBAN AS kodeBeban, I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", N_PPTK AS namaPptk, I_PPTK_NIP AS nipPptk, C_BULAN AS bulan, KET AS keterangan, N_SKPD AS "skpd.namaSkpd", V_SPP AS nilaiSpp FROM ( SELECT TMSPM.I_ID, TMSPP.I_ID AS I_IDSPP, TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, TMSPM.I_SPMNO, TMSPM.D_SPMNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, TMSPM.E_SPM AS KET, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, SUM (TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.V_SPP) V_SPP FROM TMSPP , TMSPM, TMSPPCETAK, TMSPPRINCIBIAYA , TRSKPD WHERE TMSPM.I_IDSPP = TMSPP.I_ID AND TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_IDSPP = TMSPP.I_ID AND TMSPPCETAK.C_STATUS_CETAK ='1' AND TMSPP.I_ID = TMSPPCETAK.I_ID AND TRSKPD.I_ID = TMSPP.I_IDSKPD AND TMSPP.C_BEBAN = 'LS' AND TMSPP.C_JENIS = '4' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TMSPMCETAK WHERE TMSPMCETAK.I_ID = TMSPM.I_ID ) AND TMSPM.I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} AND TMSPM.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} GROUP BY TMSPM.I_ID, TMSPP.I_ID , TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, TMSPM.I_SPMNO, TMSPM.D_SPMNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, TMSPM.E_SPM, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD union all SELECT NULL AS I_ID, TMSPP.I_ID AS I_IDSPP, TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, NULL AS I_SPMNO, NULL AS D_SPMNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, NULL AS KET, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, SUM (TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.V_SPP) V_SPP FROM TMSPP ,TMSPPCETAK, TMSPPRINCIBIAYA , TRSKPD WHERE TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_IDSPP = TMSPP.I_ID AND TMSPPCETAK.C_STATUS_CETAK ='1' AND TMSPP.I_ID = TMSPPCETAK.I_ID AND TRSKPD.I_ID = TMSPP.I_IDSKPD AND TMSPP.C_BEBAN = 'LS' AND TMSPP.C_JENIS = '4' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TMSPM WHERE TMSPP.I_ID = TMSPM.I_IDSPP ) AND TMSPP.I_IDSKPD = #{idskpd} AND TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahun} GROUP BY TMSPP.I_ID , TMSPP.C_ANGG_TAHUN, TMSPP.I_SPPNO, TMSPP.D_SPPNO, TMSPP.C_JENIS, TMSPP.C_BEBAN, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD, TMSPP.C_BULAN, TRSKPD.N_SKPD, TMSPP.I_PPTK_NIP, TMSPP.N_PPTK, TMSPP.I_IDSKPD ) )

SELECT T.I_ID AS id, T.C_ANGG_TAHUN AS tahun, T.I_SPPNO AS noSpp, T.D_SPPNO AS tglSpp, T.C_JENIS AS kodeJenis, T.C_BEBAN AS kodeBeban, T.I_IDSKPD AS "skpd.idSkpd", P.N_SKPD AS "skpd.namaSkpd", T.N_PPTK AS namaPptk, T.N_PPTK AS namaBendahara, T.I_PPTK_NIP AS nipPptk, T.I_PPTK_NIP AS nipBendahara, T.C_UANGMUKA AS kodeUangMuka, T.C_BULAN || '/' || T.C_ANGG_TAHUN AS bulan, T.E_SPP AS keterangan, S.I_SPMNO AS noSpm, S.D_SPMNO AS tglSpm, null AS noNpwp, COALESCE( S.E_SPM, T.E_SPP) AS keteranganSpm, T.C_BANK_TRANSFER AS kodeBank, T.N_BANK AS namaBank, T.N_WP AS namaPenerima, T.N_OBJEKPAJAK AS namaYayasan, T.I_REK_BANK AS noRekeningSPM ,S.I_ID as idspm FROM TMSPP T INNER JOIN TMSPPCETAK C ON C.I_ID = T.I_ID LEFT JOIN trskpd p ON P.I_ID = T.I_IDSKPD LEFT JOIN TMSPM S ON S.I_IDSPP = T.I_ID WHERE T.I_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: UPDATE TMSPM SET D_SPMNO = #{tglSpm}, E_SPM = REPLACE ( REPLACE (REPLACE (#{keteranganSpm} , CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' '), CHR(9), ' ' ) WHERE I_ID = #{idspm}
mapper.select: SELECT I_ID as idspp, C_AKUN as cAkun, N_AKUN as nAkun, V_SPP as nilaiSpp FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_ID, TRBAS.C_AKUN, TRBAS.N_AKUN, TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.V_SPP FROM TRBAS , TMSPPRINCIBIAYA WHERE TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID AND I_IDSPP = #{idspp} ORDER BY TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_ID ASC )a )X WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}

SELECT count(rn )AS total FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_ID, TRBAS.C_AKUN, TRBAS.N_AKUN, TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.V_SPP FROM TRBAS , TMSPPRINCIBIAYA WHERE TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_IDBAS = trbas.I_ID AND I_IDSPP = #{idspp} ORDER BY TMSPPRINCIBIAYA.I_ID ASC )a )X
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMSPM ( I_ID, I_IDSPP, C_ANGG_TAHUN, I_SPMNO, D_SPMNO, I_IDSKPD, E_SPM, C_UANGMUKA) VALUES ( SEQ_TMSPM.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{tahun},#{noSpm},#{tglSpm}, #{skpd.idSkpd} , REPLACE ( REPLACE (REPLACE (#{keteranganSpm} , CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' '), CHR(9), ' ' ) ,#{kodeUangMuka} )

INSERT INTO TMSPMRINCIBL (I_ID, I_IDSPM, I_IDSPP, I_IDBL, I_IDKEGIATAN, I_IDBAS, V_SPM, I_PGUN_REKAM, D_PGUN_REKAM ) VALUES ( SEQ_I_SPMNO.NEXTVAL ,#{idspm}, #{idspp}, #{idBl}, #{kegiatan.idKegiatan}, #{akun.idAkun}, #{nilaiSpp}, #{idEntry}, #{tglEntry})
